title: Admission interview AI assistant
description: Developed an application to manage reception functions and automate pre-admission interviews
challenge: The main challenge was to create an efficient solution to automate the numerous pre-admission interviews conducted daily at the university of ESPRIT.
contribution: I developed the core algorithms and implemented the machine learning models that power the chatbot assistant. Additionally, I integrated the application with existing university systems to streamline the admission process.

title: Bionic Hand Prosthesis
description: This advanced prosthetic hand was meticulously designed and 3D printed, incorporating state-of-the-art technologies such as electromyography (EMG) sensors and servo-motors
challenge: The main challenge was to create an efficient prosthetic hand that responds accurately to muscle signals and movements after amputation.
contribution: I led the development of the Bionic Hand, overseeing the design, 3D printing, and integration of EMG sensors and servo-motors. I also collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to ensure the prosthesis met functional and ergonomic standards.
